name: Gamers' Connect!
description:
A game where you emotionally connect with other gamers while making a game for a game jam.

Made in 1 week using renpy, and my first visual novel >_<

Submission for Gameception 2022, hosted by NUS Games Development Group!

The best way to play this game is to play only a single playthrough since each of the 3 best ending share around 80% of content.

Team Members:

Ger Hean - Project Manager, Designer, Programmer, Art/Audio Integration 

Features

  • Around 10000 words!
  • Experience 3 interweaving stories!
  • Childhood friend is the only (optional) romance route! (I refuse to let her lose :p)

Potential Future Features

  • Better art
  • CG images for iconic scenes
  • Minor voicing
  • Rewriting parts of the story which are not too good.
